alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 10:49PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 3,000 feet and 3 to 9 inches above 3,000 feet. * WHERE...Kamiah, Nezperce, Craigmont, Winchester, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
